flashtype: Auto pop-up; retractable; built-in flash in the pentamirror
accessoriesincluded: Eyecup EF; wide strap EW-100DB IV; Battery Pack LP-E8; Battery Charger LC-E8E; USB interface cable IFC-130U; EOS Digital Solution Disk & Software Instruction Manual CD; Camera Instruction Manual
viewfindereyepoint: Approx. 19 mm (At -1m-1 from the eyepiece lens center)
viewfinderframecoverage: Approx. 95% vertically and horizontally (with Eye point approx. 19mm)
flashmeteringsystem: E-TTL II autoflash (evaluative flash metering and average flash metering); FE Lock
